issue.title: [C++][Compute] Document out-of-source addition to the FunctionRegistry
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13385](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13385). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The FunctionRegistry class provides support for consumers of the library to define their own compute functions and add them to the registry for usage in filter expressions, projections, etc. We don't have any documentation on how to do this, and it'd be worthwhile to add an example too.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13385?focusedCommentId=17384310) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10748
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10748>
